reviewText: A basic barebones approach to the basics of freestyle with an interesting way to introduce it. An easy progression in which you may not of necessarily thought about. Not a video looking for Glamour but gratitude. Instructor just demonstrates everything in a nice small way to help you build to the big picture. A front side 180 and a blindside switch to forward 180 put together can lead you to accomplishing a frontside 360. The insight into some freestyle starters...recommended...
